message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it's a great deal considering its value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $130.  This product is very high-quality and I believe it will bring you a lot of value.
I understand the product is high-quality, but $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $110 for it. Can we meet in the middle at $115?
